CmdLine: apt-get update -y &&     apt-get install -y curl autoconf genisoimage cmake python makefs bison                        ruby2.0 zip unzip e2tools &&     ln -sf ruby2.0 /usr/bin/ruby &&     curl -o- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/creationix/nvm/v0.31.0/install.sh | bash &&     bash -c '. ~/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm install 4'
